description: Shadow Copies creation using operating systems utilities, possible credential access
false_positives: Legitimate administrator working with shadow copies, access for backup purposes
name: Shadow Copies Creation Using Operating Systems Utilities
query: ((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\vssadmin.exe) OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll" OR "wmic.exe" OR "VSSADMIN.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:*shadow* AND process.command_line.text:*create*))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
